I met with electric power producers, we addressed the stability in the electricity tariff. The price will not change in the coming months.
I recognize the efforts of electricity producers / distributors that have contributed to keeping costs unchanged
This stability will allow a reduction in the price of the fares to begin from May 2015.

Today I met with the directors of the Anam, to discuss the initiative we are promoting to modify the General Electricity Law.
The modification of the law includes a proposal to reduce the cost of the public lighting tariff, which affects the final consumer.
The bill is key in the development of the nation, responds to a need raised by the population of the interior of the country.

I am about to address the United Nations General Assembly in New York. Follow it live: http://t.co/2WvDtT7neD #UNGA69 http://t.co/lBNQLaDQon
When shared values are under pressure & the order of things seems to be unravelling, we must act. We can make the world a safer place again.
The EU continues to stand firmly in its solidarity with #Ukraine & its people in the face of the illegal annexation of #Crimea. #UNGA69
Europe responded to aggression & violation of international law with a wide range of sanctions- even if they could hurt our own economies.
An inclusive #Ukraine, with a new social contract and a fair balance between parts & whole, is the best way to secure the country's future.
With #Russia, our biggest neighbour, we are ready to engage and re-establish a basis of trust, of promises kept. #UNGA69
On #ISIL: we must block financial & weapon flows, cut off illegal oil revenue, stop influx of foreign fighters. EU countries work on this.
We need a political solution for #Syria. We owe it to the close to 200,000 victims, to the millions who have had to flee their homes.
On #Gaza: we need a two-state solution with an independent, democratic, viable Palestinian state, living in peace with Israel & neighbours.
Défi climatique: l'Europe reste engagée en 1ere ligne et démontrera l'année prochaine dans les négociations de #Paris2015.
Nous sommes réunis ici non pas pour déplorer l'impardonnable mais pour nourrir l'espoir, réaliser l'indispensable- agir ensemble. #UNGA69
We must overcome fear, restore justice, strive for peace. My speech at #UNGA69: http://t.co/otZKQkOEfc.
